Class Main

  • java.lang.Object
    • Main
  • public class Main
extends java.lang.Object
    This method runs the main operations of the application where the user can select options to manipulate data in a certain way

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Main()

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static void addPosts()
      Asks the user to enter a title, filename and number of likes.
      static void addPosts​(java.lang.String postAcc, java.lang.String postTitle, int numLikes, java.lang.String fileName)
      Adds posts to the account of a user based off the actions from a file
      static void changeTitle()
      Method to change the title of a post for a certain account.
      static void createAccount()
      Method to create an account and add it to the binary tree based on user input.
      static void createAccount​(java.lang.String accName, java.lang.String desc)
      Method to create an account based on the actions loaded from a file.
      static void deleteAccount()
      Deletes an account based on the username that the user enters.
      static void displayPosts()
      Displays all the posts for a single user if the account exists

      Finds the description of a given account by passing in username to search in the tree and by outputting the description of it.

      Method that finds a post based off the filename.
      static void loadFileActions()
      Loads actions from an external file to create and add a file
      static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      Main method for the application, will allow user to run all processes

        public Main()

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main method for the application, will allow user to run all processes
        Parameters:
        args - The user input to the terminal

      • findDesc

        public static void findDesc()
        Finds the description of a given account by passing in username to search in the tree and by outputting the description of it. If the username is not found in the binary tree then it will output that it does not exist.
        Parameters:
        targetName - The name of the user to search in the binary tree

      • createAccount

        public static void createAccount()
        Method to create an account and add it to the binary tree based on user input.

      • createAccount

        public static void createAccount​(java.lang.String accName,
                                 java.lang.String desc)
        Method to create an account based on the actions loaded from a file.
        Parameters:
        accName - The name of the user to be added to the tree
        desc - The description of the respective account entered

      • deleteAccount

        public static void deleteAccount()
        Deletes an account based on the username that the user enters. If it is not found, the user can try again if they wish

      • displayPosts

        public static void displayPosts()
        Displays all the posts for a single user if the account exists

      • addPosts

        public static void addPosts()
        Asks the user to enter a title, filename and number of likes. It then creates a post object and adds it to the linked list belonging to a user

      • addPosts

        public static void addPosts​(java.lang.String postAcc,
                            java.lang.String postTitle,
                            int numLikes,
                            java.lang.String fileName)
        Adds posts to the account of a user based off the actions from a file
        Parameters:
        postAcc - The account to add the post to
        postTitle - The title of the post to be added
        numLikes - The number of likes for the post
        fileName - The fileName of the post

      • loadFileActions

        public static void loadFileActions()
        Loads actions from an external file to create and add a file
        Throws:
        e - If the file cannot be found it throws this exception

      • changeTitle

        public static void changeTitle()
        Method to change the title of a post for a certain account. This is if the user's account exists and if the post entered also exists

      • findPost

        public static void findPost()
        Method that finds a post based off the filename. If the post does not exist, gives the user an appropriate error message
